titleStmt.title: P. Rami Dialecticae libri duo, scholiis G. Tempelli Cantabrigiensis illustrati. Quibus accessit, eodem authore, de Porphyrianis prædicabilibus disputatio. Item: epistolæ de P. Rami Dialectica contra Iohannis Piscatoris responsionem defensio, in capita viginti novem redacta
Dialectica
titleStmt.author: Ramus, Petrus, 1515-1572.
Temple, William, Sir, 1555-1627. aut

notesStmt.note: "Epistolæ de P. Rami Dialectica contra Iohannis Piscatoris responsionem defensio Guliemi Tempelli" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
